game

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    The level class of the game. This class generates all the worlds based on the file passed in with an array of blocks.

    Created by Justin Pu May 20, 2015 Modified by Siavash Samiei May 24, May 25, May 26, 2015

    Instance Variables

    blocks ArrayList of Block, all blocks on the level.

    name String, name of the level.

    length Int, stores length of the level.

    author String, author that the level is based on.

    checkpointLocations Int [], array that stores all checkpoint x values of the world.

    Total hours spent:

    Justin Pu: 5 hours

    Version:
    7 06.08.15
    Author:
    Justin Pu

    • Method Detail

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock(int x,
                      int y)
        Returns the block at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        x - desired x coordinate
        y - desired y coordinate
        Returns:
        the block at the specified location, null if it doesn't exit

      • getVisible

        public java.util.ArrayList<Block> getVisible(int x)
        Parameters:
        x - the start x coordinate of the screen in relation to the level (pixels).
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Block containing all the visible blocks in view.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Block block)
        Removes the block passed.
        Parameters:
        block - the Block to be removed from the Level.
        Returns:
        whether the block has been successfully removed or not.

      • getCheckpointLocation

        public int getCheckpointLocation(int checkpointReached)
        Returns the x block location of the checkpoint specified.
        Parameters:
        checkpointReached - the latest checkpoint reached by the player to set respawn
        Returns:
        the x location of the block of the checkpoint specified.
